Package rubydragon.ruby

Class RubyDragonPlugin

java.lang.Object
ghidra.framework.plugintool.Plugin
ghidra.app.plugin.ProgramPlugin
rubydragon.DragonPlugin
rubydragon.ruby.RubyDragonPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
ghidra.app.plugin.core.interpreter.InterpreterConnection, ghidra.framework.plugintool.util.PluginEventListener, ghidra.framework.plugintool.util.ServiceListener, ghidra.util.classfinder.ExtensionPoint
public class RubyDragonPlugin extends DragonPlugin implements ghidra.app.plugin.core.interpreter.InterpreterConnection
RubyDragon provides Ruby support within Ghidra, both in an interactive terminal session as well as standalone scripts.
